sections.heading: Volunteer; prohibited acts.A court appointed special advocate volunteer shall not:(1) Accept any compensation for the duties and responsibilities of his or her appointment;(2) Have any association that creates a conflict of interest with his or her duties;(3) Be related to any party or attorney invo
sections.text: Volunteer; prohibited acts.A court appointed special advocate volunteer shall not:(1) Accept any compensation for the duties and responsibilities of his or her appointment;(2) Have any association that creates a conflict of interest with his or her duties;(3) Be related to any party or attorney involved in a case;(4) Be employed in a position that could result in a conflict of interest or give rise to the appearance of a conflict; or(5) Use the position to seek or accept gifts or special privileges.SourceLaws 2000, LB 1167, ยง 34.
